xeroz.tech was good only for 2 months.
I first had a vps with them in India location for my Minecraft server and it ran well. It often overloaded as I ran multiple servers and it pretty much just lagged my Minecraft server and nothing much.
Later I renewed the VPS to start a MC hosting so I could provide Minecraft servers in India.
Here are some pics before I explain



he repeatedly blamed us for the often crashes

I even showed him that we're not using much CPU and something is triggering high CPU from their side

I told him this yet he never replied to this

I knew he was lying as I ran 3-4 Minecraft servers previously before starting a host and they all used nearly 600%+ and even on overload they never crashed, they basically used to just get laggy and kick all players like every normal server.
We had multiple crashes
This is where it happened

Our VPS went down for over 2 weeks and at the first day I asked for priority support and said I was interested in paying but he never replied back on that

he asked for my vps IP and never replied back regarding it, later when I tried to get back he claims he isn't free on weekends.
Later I contact him the next day and he claims to be on a break!
Before I continue let me tell you that he did some changes to the vps panel the before day which resulted in many of the vps clients having their services down and what does he do about it? HE GOES ON A LITERAL VACATION!

He doesn't even care about his customers!
He later says he blocked my sys admin when we were literally stressed about our Minecraft host as our clients were complaining about the service being offline. I was at my worst at that time as it was very depressing.

He later talks about compensation if the issue wasn't fixed in a week

he then says "If its not fixed this week it will be 2 months."
I was pretty fine with that, I tried to move on and understand him and waited.
Guess what...
I never received the required help

and when I ask about the compensation, he shows attitude saying "Don't know what you are trying to get by dmming me, e-mail aiden@xeroz.tech directly"
That was the last convo we had with Patric/wicktor.

Now aiden. I really thought he wanted to help but he was just wasting our time.
He asked me for the vps IP and I provide it to him and then he says this

very funny ^^
I show him a pic of the IP and then he decides to not reply for 2 days

then he says this

Not helpful guys
Now he literally tells us to reinstall!!

Now that's just bad company service, I was ASSURED that there would be 0% dataloss

yet it happened.
I reply back showing him that I'm unable to ssh into the vps and he tells me to try again!

Now here's the funny part

My VPS is suspended as the bill was overdue as I didn't pay for it at that time. I'm gonna tell you what I told him.

  • I was promised 2 months compensation
  • The vps was down for 2 weeks so I've been waiting for a fix and compensation so I didn't pay it.
    Now he starts talking about the invoice where Patrick/wicktor had created a new invoice for me in the past so I can renew the vps and use it to start my mc host

I thought he was talking about the present invoice and I tell him that I was promised compensation so give it to me

Now he starts talking about the old expired invoice again

I finally understand at that time and explained to him here so he can understand

Here's the ultimate scam, He gives me only 17 days compensation, not what patrick agreed to give.
He pretty much just asks for the IP & pass & ignores me after that.
arrowtan Maybe he was using consumer VPS nodes for other things
